data.label: Jeffrey Epstein
data.notes: Died August 10, 2019 in MCC New York. Convicted 2008 FL, arrested 2019 SDNY.

data.label: Ghislaine Maxwell
data.notes: SITREP #4. Convicted Dec 2021, 5 of 6 counts incl. sex trafficking of a minor. 20 years.

data.label: Jean-Luc Brunel
data.notes: SITREP #6. Founded MC2 with Epstein funding. Died Feb 19, 2022 in Paris prison.

data.label: Daniel Siad
data.notes: Tier 1 #3. Active recruiter 2013-2019. FBI subject #13. 'I have girls staying with me.'

data.label: Sarah Kellen
data.notes: SITREP #1. NPA immunity. Scheduled abuse sessions.

data.label: Nadia Marcinkova
data.notes: SITREP #5. NPA immunity. Dual victim/co-conspirator status.

data.label: Adriana Ross
data.notes: SITREP #2. Invoked 5th Amendment 100+ times. Removed computer drives during search warrant.

data.label: Lesley Groff
data.notes: SITREP #3. Executive assistant. Coordinated limo pickups of young women. 'Remain loyal to JE.'

data.label: Tony Figueroa
data.notes: Tier 1 #5. '$200 apiece for every one we brought over.' Recruited from local high schools.

data.label: Leslie Wexner
data.notes: SITREP #8. 'Gang stuff for over 15 years.' Transferred $46M+ to Epstein. Deposition Feb 18 2026.

data.label: Prince Andrew
data.notes: Tier 2 #10. Epstein introduced '26, russian, clevere beautiful' woman. Thirsk £126K claims.

data.label: Peter Mandelson
data.notes: Tier 2 #11. Advance notice of 500B euro EU bailout. $75K payments. Met Police investigating.

data.label: Valdson Cotrin
data.notes: Tier 2 #13. Distributed cash to women in Paris on Epstein's orders.

data.label: Deepak Chopra
data.notes: Tier 3 #14. 'God is a construct. Cute girls are real.' 'Bring your girls' with fake name.

data.label: Elon Musk
data.notes: Tier 3 #18. 'What day/night will be the wildest party on your island?' 16+ emails 2012-2013.

data.label: Howard Lutnick
data.notes: Tier 3 #21. Lied to Congress about last contact. 2012 island visit. Adfin LLC partnership.

data.label: David Stern
data.notes: Tier 3 #17. 'My team. Anyone cute?' Coordinated Prince Andrew's access.

data.label: Leon Botstein
data.notes: Tier 3 #20. Helicopter ride with 'girls' to island. $56K Patek Philippe watch.

data.label: Sultan Bin Sulayem
data.notes: Tier 3 #15. 'I loved the torture video.' Named by Massie and Khanna.

data.label: Miroslav Lajcak
data.notes: Tier 3 #16. 'Girls here are as gorgeous as ever :)' / 'I would take the MI girl.' Resigned.

data.label: Roger Schank
data.notes: Tier 3 #19. 'Shvartzers ready to go' — racist email with photos of Black women.

data.label: Peter Thiel
data.notes: Tier 4 #22. $40M Valar Ventures. 'I never question your judgment.'

data.label: Leon Black
data.notes: Tier 4 #23. $158M in transfers over 5 years. Apollo Global co-founder.

data.label: Terje Rod-Larsen
data.notes: Tier 4 #24. $11M+ total. 'Best friend' / 'thoroughly good human being.' Charged complicity gross corruption.

data.label: Mort Zuckerman
data.notes: Tier 4 #25. $21M STC agreement. Daily News/US News/Boston Properties.

data.label: Jimmy Cayne
data.notes: Tier 4 #26. Post-conviction contact. Epstein used 'Bear Stearns / Jimmy Cayne' as employer ref for Russian visa.

data.label: Darren Indyke
data.notes: Attorney / Authorized Agent. Estate co-executor. Listed on dozens of Epstein LLCs.

data.label: Richard Kahn
data.notes: Accountant / Agent. All employees required to contact Kahn if contacted by law enforcement.

data.label: David Rogers
data.notes: Pilot. Maintained flight logs ('Lolita Express'). 'Remain loyal to JE.'

data.label: Larry Visoski
data.notes: Pilot. Testified at Maxwell trial. Managed N212JE and N908JE.

data.label: Juan Alessi
data.notes: Former FL household manager 1989-2002. Witnessed Maxwell recruit 15-16yo at Mar-a-Lago.

data.label: Karyna Shuliak
data.notes: Last girlfriend. Dentist (DDS). Belarus-born. 36,394 docs — most mentioned individual.

data.label: Sky Roberts
data.notes: Virginia's father. Mar-a-Lago maintenance. Alleged familial sexual abuse from age 7.

data.label: Ron Eppinger
data.notes: Perfect 10 magazine. FL 794.011(8) familial sexual abuse. Trafficking ring 1990s.

data.label: Virginia Giuffre
data.notes: Key witness. Recruited at Mar-a-Lago age 16. Died 2025. Memoir: Nobody's Girl.

data.label: Peter Nygard
data.notes: Nygard Cay, Bahamas. Convicted sex trafficking. FBI C-20 investigated alongside Epstein.

data.label: Faith Kates
data.notes: Next Model Management founder. 5,210 docs. Largely unexplored.

data.label: Paolo Zampolli
data.notes: ID Models founder. Trump connection.

data.label: Fabrice Aidan
data.notes: UN official. Ordered shoes through his UN office for Kellen.

data.label: Boris Nikolic
data.notes: Named as backup executor in Epstein's will signed 2 days before death.

data.label: Peggy Siegal
data.notes: Hollywood publicist. Hosted Epstein at events post-conviction.

data.label: David Geffen
data.notes: DreamWorks co-founder. October 2012 master contacts list.

data.label: Reid Hoffman
data.notes: LinkedIn co-founder. October 2012 contacts list.

data.label: Jack Lang
data.notes: Former French Minister. Charged 'aggravated tax fraud laundering.'

data.label: Princess Mette-Marit
data.notes: Crown Princess of Norway. October 2012 contacts.

data.label: Thorbjorn Jagland
data.notes: Council of Europe Secretary General. October 2012 contacts.

data.label: Heather Mann
data.notes: 'Sweet pea'/'Q'. London-based. ~$20M blue diamond chain.

data.label: Lucy Clive
data.notes: Probable SITREP #7. Kevin Maxwell's girlfriend. Terramar co-director.

data.label: Etienne Binant
data.notes: 'eitienn'. Technical/property staff.

data.label: Jes Staley
data.notes: Former Barclays CEO. JPMorgan exec who managed Epstein accounts.

data.label: Glenn Dubin
data.notes: Highbridge Capital. Named by multiple victims.

data.label: Bill Clinton
data.notes: Multiple flights. Deposition Feb 26-27, 2026. FBI notes: 'three women not under age @ USVI.'

data.label: Alan Dershowitz
data.notes: Epstein defense attorney. Accused by Giuffre (settled).

data.label: Larry Summers
data.notes: Former Treasury Secretary. Harvard president during Epstein donations.

data.label: Andrew Farkas
data.notes: Island Hospitality Management. 9,150 docs. iMessages through 2019.

data.label: George Delson
data.notes: 634 docs. Needs investigation.

data.label: Southern Trust Company
data.notes: Epstein's primary financial vehicle. STC agreements with Zuckerman et al.

data.label: HBRK Associates
data.notes: Epstein business entity.

data.label: Gratitude America
data.notes: Epstein foundation. Tax-exempt vehicle.

data.label: MC2 Model Management
data.notes: Founded by Brunel with Epstein financing. Primary procurement pipeline.

data.label: Next Model Management
data.notes: Brunel had 50% ownership through Epstein.

data.label: Karin Models
data.notes: Paris modeling agency in Epstein network.

data.label: ID Models
data.notes: Zampolli's agency.

data.label: Bear Stearns
data.notes: Epstein's early career. Cayne connection.

data.label: Apollo Global Management
data.notes: Leon Black co-founded. $158M to Epstein.

data.label: L Brands / The Limited
data.notes: Wexner's company. Victoria's Secret parent.

data.label: Victoria's Secret
data.notes: Brunel used VS casting calls as recruitment tool.

data.label: Valar Ventures
data.notes: Thiel's fund. $40M Epstein investment. Largest estate asset.

data.label: Edge Foundation
data.notes: John Brockman's science salon. $638K from Epstein.

data.label: Wexner Foundation
data.notes: Leslie Wexner's philanthropic vehicle.

data.label: Clinton Foundation
data.notes: Epstein donations and flight connections.

data.label: Mar-a-Lago
data.notes: Palm Beach club. Virginia Giuffre recruited here by Maxwell. Sky Roberts employed here.

data.label: 9 East 71st Street
data.notes: $77M Manhattan mansion. Gifted by Wexner. Primary NYC abuse location.

data.label: Little St. James Island
data.notes: Private island, USVI. Purchased 1998. Primary offshore abuse site.

data.label: Great St. James Island
data.notes: Second USVI island. Purchased 2016.

data.label: Avenue Foch Apartment
data.notes: Paris apartment, 16th arrondissement. Cotrin managed. Cash distributed to women here.

data.label: El Brillo Way
data.notes: Palm Beach mansion. Primary FL abuse location. Alessi managed 1989-2002.
